certificates.title: Meta Front-End Developer Specialization
certificates.description: A comprehensive program that prepares learners for a career in front-end development. Covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, UI/UX, and version control using Git. Learners build responsive and accessible web applications.

certificates.title: Meta Back-End Developer Specialization
certificates.description: This specialization equips learners with the skills needed for back-end development roles. Topics include Python programming, version control, databases, Django, APIs, and deployment practices.

certificates.title: Machine Learning with Python
certificates.description: Introduces machine learning concepts, techniques, and algorithms using Python. Topics include supervised and unsupervised learning, regression, classification, clustering, and recommendation systems using libraries such as scikit-learn.
